1: Humanity grows; daughters enrich thriving generations.
2: Freely choose spouses and build committed, loving families.
3: Use your finite years to live wisely and well.
4: Fruitful unions yield mighty people of lasting renown.
5: Fill every thought with continual goodness and compassion
6: Care deeply and take responsibility for your creations' outcomes.
7: Renew creation to preserve life and uphold goodness.
8: A good person receives gracious favor
9: Live with integrity and walk closely with the divine.
10: Foster thriving families that carry life into the future.
11: Peace and integrity fill the world.
12: Live with integrity and follow the right way on earth
13: Cultivate peace so life flourishes on earth.
14: I build a resilient, well-sealed refuge with purposeful rooms.
15: Use precise, proportional measurements to build durable, safe structures.
16: I build a well-lit, accessible, multi-level shelter.
17: Cleansing waters renew the world, opening paths for new life.
18: Enduring promise stands; families gather in safe shelter.
19: Preserve life by gathering breeding pairs of each kind.
20: Safeguard every kind to keep life flourishing.
21: I gather food to sustain me and those with me.
22: Follow trustworthy guidance completely and faithfully.
